name: CMHeadphoneMotionManagerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that defines an interface for connecting and disconnecting headphones.

items.name: func headphoneMotionManagerDidConnect(CMHeadphoneMotionManager)
items.desc: Performs a callback to the delegate after you connect headphones.

items.name: func headphoneMotionManagerDidDisconnect(CMHeadphoneMotionManager)
items.desc: Performs a callback to the delegate after you disconnect headphones.

items.name: typealias CMHeadphoneMotionManager.DeviceMotionHandler
items.desc: The type of block callback for handling headphone-motion data.
